title: Hypermedia-Based Language Learning Design: Discovery and Incidental Learning Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental computer literacy and intermediate-level language proficiency
context.additional_context: Self-directed learning environment configuration for language proficiency improvement targeting current practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can infer language rules with over 80% accuracy while navigating unstructured content in hypermedia environments
Learners acquire over 50 context-specific vocabulary items using multimodal resources (text, images, audio) within hypermedia
Learners can independently diagnose and resolve language problems without peer collaboration through discovery learning activities
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
